p:
Where t is the day of the observatio n; Y
t is the observed daily cases number of H7N9 on day t; “ β0” is the intercept; “Intervention” is the independent variables with three categories as mentioned above; “MTem” is the daily mean temperature; “RHum” is the daily mean relative humidity. Following this method, we quantitatively estimated the effect of LPMs closure implemented for cities.
